# MTLColorWriteMask

**Structure**

Values used to specify a mask to permit or restrict writing to color channels of a color value.

## Declaration

```swift
struct MTLColorWriteMask
```

## Overview

The values [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLColorWriteMask/red], [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLColorWriteMask/green], [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLColorWriteMask/blue], and [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLColorWriteMask/alpha] select one color channel each, and they can be bitwise combined.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Returns a new color write mask from a specified raw value.

## Type Properties

- **all**: All color channels are enabled.
- **alpha**: The alpha color channel is enabled.
- **blue**: The blue color channel is enabled.
- **green**: The green color channel is enabled.
- **red**: The red color channel is enabled.
- **unspecialized**: Defers assigning the color write mask.

## Configuring render pipeline states

- **pixelFormat**: The pixel format of the color attachment’s texture.
- **writeMask**: A bitmask that restricts which color channels are written into the texture.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
